name: short rows brioche hat
sizes_available: one size fits most teens and adults; seamed & laid flat  9″ w x 12″ l
notes:
the short rows brioche hat is a knit-look crochet hat with lovely shaped top, worked flat from side to side in repeating sections (wedges) shaped with easy short rows.
